channel.title: Funny on The B0ardside
channel.description: Recent content in Funny on The B0ardside

item.title: Jenn Schiffer talks
item.description: Up at XOXO last year, the Jenn Schiffer talk was definitely one of the most fun: this older one i found from 2015 is equally as entertaining, I love the opening sequence, it’s got a kind of “cool” Portlandia vibe!

item.title: Here's What Happens When an 18 Year Old Buys a Mainframe
item.description: Heh, funny talk from a young enthusiast who bought, moved, and got up and running, an IBM z890.
